summary: Elven Swords As They Should Be, Sleek And Beautiful
descriptionHtml:
This is a replacer for the vanilla elven sword, dagger and greatsword atm, but i plan to release these as standalone sabres when the ck is released

in my opinion elven blades should slender ornate and beautiful, exactly what the vanilla ones werent :P so heres an alternative!

also as these are very lotr-esque i shall probably do a version with the original lotr runes along the blade  :)

Installation;
NMM:
I Reccomend Using Nexus Mon Manager, just activate and accept any overwrites
Manual:
Just unpack and move the Textures folder into your data folder and say yes to any overwrites
Uninstallation;
Just delete the files added by this mod

This is only my 4th mod to be released so feedback is much appreciated and if you enjoy this, Endorse It!

Credits;
Adonnay for his meshes and textures.
and PBS3 for porting it into skyrim.

My Other Mods;
Retextures For Jaysus Swords; http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4871
author: Hrusai
